DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance two emulsion-type artificial tear .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Tolerability Clinical Performance Two Emulsion-type Artificial Tears
DOC.criteria: Between age 18 inclusive . Males females Patient generally good & stable overall health . Patient likely comply study guideline & study visit . Informed consent sign . OSDI score > 18 OR TBUT < 10 second Corneal refractive surgery contact lens wear within 6 month study . Current use Restasis Intraocular surgery within 6 month ocular laser surgery within 6 month . Pregnant lactating woman . Ocular pathology ( include glaucoma cataract ) , could impact result and/or place patient risk .
